Automatic accordion in the sidebar demo

How to set it up? Best look in the source code for this page. Some instructions:

  • Give the sidebarbox an "accordion" (note: not accordeon) id.
  • Individual collapsible items get a h2 or h3 as a header and one div or ul or whatever as content block, which needs a class "pane".
  • Every "pane" (as the accordion terminology calls it) needs an ID.
  • If you have a ul with a couple of links in there and you want those links to load the next pane, first make sure the link actually returns a page with the desired content in some block with the same ID as the pane you're replacing. It can be just a full page or a snippet. The idea is to return a full page, though.
  • In the ul/div with the links, add a class "accordion-load-next" so that the links are set up to load the next pane via ajax. And add an attibute "data-next-pane-id" to tell which ID needs loading/replacing.

Note: the <ul> elements have a "without-bullets" class to remove the bullets from the list items.
